sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"义务"或"职责"之意。
means: duty ： 指按道德和法律的标准，一个人永远要尽的义务，强调自觉性。
obligation ： 指道义上或法律上对他人的义务，强调强制性。也指因作出承诺而被迫履行的某种义务。
responsibility ： 指任何义务、职责、责任或职务上所尽的本分，强调对他人的责任。
function ： 指因职务或职业关系去履行某种职责。

sentence.Network_en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

sentence.Network_en: The first duty of a director is to recce his location.
sentence.Network_cn: 主管的第一项任务是熟悉所在地区的情况。

sentence.Network_en: He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

jx.jx_en_mean: serve or act as a substitute for something else

lj.lj_ly: the rusting shack which did duty as the bridge.

jx.jx_en_mean: engaged (or not engaged) in one's regular work
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在（或不在）值班（的），在上（或下了）班（的）

lj.lj_ly: the doorman had &B{gone off duty} and the lobby was unattended.
lj.lj_ls: 看门人下班了，大厅无人照看。

lj.lj_ly: You are duty bound to help your little sister and brother.
lj.lj_ls: 你有责任帮助你的弟弟妹妹

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French duete, from Old French deu (see due)

entry.def: Duty is work that you have to do for your job.

example.ex: Staff must report for duty at their normal place of work...
example.tran: 职员必须在平时上班的地方签到。

example.ex: My duty is to look after the animals.
example.tran: 我的责任就是照看这些动物。

entry.def: Your duties are tasks which you have to do because they are part of your job.

example.ex: I carried out my duties conscientiously...
example.tran: 我一丝不苟地履行我的职责。

example.ex: He was relieved of his duties as presidential adviser.
example.tran: 他被撤销了总统顾问一职。

entry.def: If you say that something is your duty, you believe that you ought to do it because it is your responsibility.

example.ex: I consider it my duty to write to you and thank you.
example.tran: 我认为写信向你表达谢意是我的责任。

entry.def: Duties are taxes which you pay to the government on goods that you buy.

example.tran: 进口税的平均水平仍然在 30%。

entry.def: If someone such as a policeman or a nurse is off duty, they are not working. If someone is on duty, they are working.

example.ex: Four officers were told to go off duty and rest at home...
example.tran: 四名官员已经被通知停职在家休整。

means.word_mean: 1. work that you are obliged to perform for moral or legal reasons;
2. the social force that binds you to your obligations and the courses of action demanded by that force;

sentences.sentence: "we must instill a sense of duty in our children"
"every right implies a responsibility; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty"- John D.Rockefeller Jr

means.word_mean: 3. a government tax on imports or exports;

sentences.sentence: "they signed a treaty to lower duties on trade between their countries"

list.explanation: [海军用语]斜躺着睡觉(尤指休息一下的躺睡)

example.en: Let's get in some pad duty.
example.zh: 咱们来偷点儿懒，躺一会儿。

auth_sentence.content: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.
auth_sentence.res_content: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.

auth_sentence.content: Lots of police are on duty on the roads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lots of police are on duty on the roads.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lots of police are on duty on the roads.

auth_sentence.content: He has declared voting to be a religious duty.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has declared voting to be a religious duty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has declared voting to be a religious duty.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 义务, 责任, 职责, 职务, 税
stems_affixes.word_buile: du=due债务,义务+ty表名词→职责, 职务, 税

Sentence.sentence: With the time spent eating, sleeping and taking care of household duties.

sentences.en: The committee carried out the duties entrusted to it.
sentences.cn: 委员会履行了赋予它的职责。

sentences.en: I have a duty to perform.
New duties will be imposed on wines and spirits.

jushi.english: The captain of the ship bears a heavy load of duty and anxiety at all times.
jushi.chinese: 船长肩负着重任,总是忧心忡忡的。
你已经履行了自己的职责。
